setting_auth_mode_description: Choose how users authenticate with Mattermost
setting_mattermost_url_description: Base URL for Mattermost server (e.g., https://mattermost.example.com). Optional - can be extracted from channel URL.
setting_admin_token_description: Mattermost personal access token for importing. Required when using admin token mode. Generate in Mattermost: Profile > Security > Personal Access Tokens.
setting_allowed_roles_description: Comma-separated list of roles that can use the import command (e.g., admin, moderator)
setting_allowed_users_description: Comma-separated list of usernames that can use the import command (in addition to allowed roles)
